lyric:
[by:NickyRomero]
[00:00.00] 作曲 : Sia Furler/Greg Kurstin
[00:00.26] 作词 : Sia Furler/Greg Kurstin
[00:00.80]编曲：Alan Walker/Greg Kurstin/Anders Froen
[00:01.59]Oh-oh-oh, oh-oh-oh, oh, oh
[00:06.63]Oh-oh-oh, oh-oh-oh, oh, oh
[00:09.76]Poetry in your body
[00:11.70]You got it in every way
[00:17.18]And can't you see it's you I'm watching?
[00:19.17]I am hot for you in every way
[00:24.63]And turn around, let me see you
[00:26.69]Wanna free you with my rhythm
[00:32.20]I know you can't get enough
[00:34.08]When I turn up with my rhythm
[00:36.85]
[00:39.20]Your body’s poetry, speak to me
[00:41.71]Won’t you let me be your rhythm tonight?
[00:44.48](Move your body, move your body)
[00:46.96]I wanna be your muse,use my music
[00:49.52]And let me be your rhythm tonight
[00:52.00](Move your body, move your body)
[00:54.20]Your body’s poetry speak to me

[01:10.26]

[01:23.56]Move your, move your body
[01:25.83]Move your body, dy, dy
[01:29.52]Move your body
[01:33.33]Move your body, dy, dy
[01:37.01]Move your body
[01:39.39]
[01:41.79]Poetry in your body
[01:43.62]Got me started
[01:44.56]May it never end
[01:49.24]Feel my rhythm in your system
[01:51.12]This is living, I'm your only friend
[01:56.66]Feel the beat in your chest
[01:58.70]Beat your chest like an animal
[02:04.02]Free the beast from it's cage
[02:06.09]Free the rage like an animal
[02:09.59]

[02:15.44]Won’t you let me be your rhythm tonight?

[03:12.47]
[03:14.03]Oh-oh-oh, oh-oh-oh, oh, oh

[03:21.50]Oh-oh-oh, oh-oh-oh, oh, oh
[03:25.21]Oh-oh-oh, oh-oh-oh, oh, oh
[03:27.83]Move your body
tlyric:
[by:Sampson劉小言]
[00:01.59]
[00:06.63]
[00:09.76]你如诗般的身体
[00:11.70]尽情的舞动着
[00:17.18]你看不见我在注视着你
[00:19.17]我为你的一切感到痴迷
[00:24.63]转过身来，让我仔细看看你
[00:26.69]想要你跟随着我的节奏嗨翻天
[00:32.20]我知道你无法满足
[00:34.08]那就跟随着这节奏一起摇摆吧
[00:39.20]你身体如诗的韵律快对我说
[00:41.71]今夜是否愿与我随这节奏摇摆
[00:44.48]快跟着这节奏舞动起来
[00:46.96]我要感受你随音乐舞动的节奏
[00:49.52]今晚就同我一起享受这激情的旋律
[00:52.00]快跟着这节奏舞动起来
[00:54.20]你身体如诗的韵律快对我说
